name: Snake All-in-One - 40 classic snake gamebox
description:
Everyone has played snake retro game. But how many different snake games has you played?
Old School Classic, Fast, Long Snake, Turn Around, Thief, Desert, Trap, Mirror, Portal....

No one meets 40 different game plays of snake games in one game.
Challenge yourself by trying all possible snake games, there must be some snake game plays become your favorites.

- 40 different game plays of snake game.
- 72 well designed levels
- 2 different game modes.
- 4 snakes with different characters.
- Full of fun and challenge.
